about_the_game:
Welcome to your new life: an isolated potato farm, an inherited debt, and the constant feeling that you’re being watched. In Potatoes and Aliens, you must plant, nurture, and harvest your crops—but there’s something wrong here. Strange lights flicker in the sky, and before long, you'll realize you're not alone.

The aliens are relentless, appearing without warning to sabotage your farm and steal your precious potatoes. At night, their presence feels closer, and the once-quiet land turns hostile. You'll need more than just farming skills to survive. Upgrade your farm’s defenses, raise a loyal dog to protect you, and keep the aliens at bay while you work the land in this survival horror comedy. 

Key Features:

  • Survival Farming: farming isn’t just about growing crops—it's about survival. You’re not only battling the elements but fending off mischievous alien invaders determined to steal your hard-earned potatoes. Your farm is your lifeline, and the success of each harvest directly impacts your ability to pay off your debt and keep your property. But it won’t be easy.

  • Alien Threats: the alien menace begins subtly, with strange occurrences around your farm—missing potatoes, odd scorch marks in the fields, and bizarre crop circles. At first, you might dismiss these events as bad luck or the work of mischievous animals. But as the sabotage escalates, it becomes clear: something far more sinister is at play.

    Your journey to uncover the truth starts with small clues. You might catch glimpses of strange lights in the night sky or hear unexplained sounds in the dead of night. These unsettling signs build up until you finally witness it: a mysterious, otherworldly figure sneaking through your crops, harvesting your potatoes for its own unknown purposes.

    Proving the aliens are real becomes your next challenge. You'll need to gather evidence, like footprints, strange alien devices left behind, or even catching an alien in the act with cameras and traps you set around the farm. As you collect these artifacts, you start to piece together the puzzle of what they want and why they're targeting your potatoes. The more proof you gather, the more gadgets and tools you unlock, giving you the edge you need to fend off the alien invaders.

    From crop disruption to outright theft, the aliens' mischief keeps escalating, preventing you from completing your harvests and selling your potatoes. Each sabotage makes your survival harder, but it also drives your determination to protect your farm. As you continue to thwart their plans, you might even discover more about their motives and the deeper mystery behind why they’ve chosen your farm as their target.

    The aliens are real—and proving it is just the first step in keeping them at bay. Can you outsmart these extraterrestrial foes and save your farm, or will their relentless interference spell disaster for your potatoes.

  • Farm Defenses: Arm yourself with advanced gadgets and makeshift defenses to protect your farm from increasingly aggressive aliens.

  • Loyal Dog Companion: Train your dog to be your most reliable ally in this strange, hostile world. They’re your first line of defense against the unknown.

  • Potato's are life: potatoes are more than just a simple crop—they’re the lifeblood of your farm and your survival. These humble spuds hold endless potential: whether you’re growing them to sell, crafting them into vodka to make a profit, or turning them into key components to fend off alien attacks. Potatoes offer versatility and are at the core of your farming adventure.

Stay up to date by joining the community Discord for updates and announcements.

content_descriptors.notes: Some mild violence between humans and aliens.

short_description: Potatoes and Aliens thrusts you into the eerie solitude of rural life, where you inherit a crumbling farm—and a debt you can’t escape. Grow potatoes to survive, but beware: something far worse than bad weather is coming for your crop.
